CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar
a long one; Mot points at words and helps Chi to sound out; tape quality poor; Mot says mhm a lot; Chi sometimes checks out words quietly with Mot before saying them aloud
MOT and Chi both in big easy chair , MOT points at words

u.a: MOT pulls back from pointing when Chi gets word right
Chi looks to Mot for help .
comments between Mot and Chi very quiet--Chi whispers to Mot for help
emphasis on each word in <but he was still hungry>
Chi whispers word to Mot again .
MOT begins pointing at words again
at sausage , MOT points to picture and whispers word
when she turns page to fat caterpillar
MOT may have whispered self part
